prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a cute blue duck with fluffy features.
Design a Pokemon with a unique blend of blue and white colors, inspired by aquatic birds.
Imagine a small, winged creature that loves to float on water, with a cheerful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that has a sleek body shape and is known for its playful nature.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has distinctive blue feathers.
Make a whimsical blue bird Pokemon that can glide through the air effortlessly.
Give me a description of a tiny Pokemon with a soothing presence and a gentle demeanor.
